General.Name: Alony Hetz Properties and Investments Ltd
General.Description: Alony Hetz Properties and Investments Ltd. publicly owned holding real-estate investment manager. Through its subsidiaries, the firm focuses on income-generating commercial real estate. It primarily invests in Israel, Europe, and North America. The firm also seeks to invest in India and Sweden. Alony Hetz Properties and Investments was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.
General.Address: Amot Atrium Tower, Ramat Gan, Israel, 5250501
